meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant known for its colorful blooms.
meanings.sent1: The buddleia in the garden attracts many butterflies.
meanings.sent2: I planted a buddleia in my backyard for its beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns under the buddleia.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a buddleia in full summer.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the buddleia filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the buddleia belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many different species belong to the buddleia genus.
meanings.sent2: The buddleia genus includes various types of flowering plants.
meanings.sent3: The gardener joked that the buddleia genus was like a big family reunion.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, the buddleia genus stands out like a star.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the diversity of the buddleia genus was a fascinating journey.
